newsitem.title: INDIA: India blue-chip commercial paper at 10.3-10.75 pct.
newsitem.headline: India blue-chip commercial paper at 10.3-10.75 pct.

text.p: Indian commercial paper by top blue-chip companies was quoted in the 10.3-10.75 percent range on Friday, dealers said.
They said primary market quotes for three-month commercial paper isued by top-rated companies (P1+) were between 10.40 and 10.75 percent.
"But this is only for top-rated firms," said a broker. "Other firms will have to look at rates above 11.0 percent."
There was little trade in commercial paper in the secondary market, dealers said.
Banks were offering around 10 percent for three-month certificates of deposit, dealers said.
